12:20 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:29 <ldubost> has quit  
12:34 <Slashman> hello, I'm looking for the option to add "Access Rights" in the "Edit" menu, I have added it to myself a while ago but other users don't have any submenu on the "Edit" button, I'm looking at the doc but I don't find any reference on how to add it  
12:35 <vmassol> !search PageEditing  
12:35 <vmassol> Slashman: first link

14:50 <msmeria> has quit  
15:00 <andrewmcveigh|wo> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <andrewmcveigh|wo> Hi, I've found a bit of a bug. I'm using the debian enterprise installer to install XWiki 5.1. Nearly everything is fine, but unicode is broken. This is because the mysql connection string made by the installer is wrong.  
15:07 <andrewmcveigh|wo> See https://www.refheap.com/19663  
15:08 <vmassol> andrewmcveigh|wo: thanks, might be good to create a jira issue to report it so that we can fix it  
15:08 <andrewmcveigh|wo> OK, will do.  
15:13 <tmortagne> andrewmcveigh|wo: did you do an upgrade because as far as I can see the connection string is fine in http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-installer-debian-mysql-common/5.1/xwiki-enterprise-installer-debian-mysql-common-5.1.deb  
15:14 <andrewmcveigh|wo> tmortagne: No, brand new install.  
15:14 <tmortagne> ha wait  
15:17 <tmortagne> what do you mean exactly by UTF8 is broken ? I can use UTF8 characters with a wiki with this configuration  
15:17 <tmortagne> even if I agree that it ended up up after escape/unescape jingling  
15:18 <tmortagne> s/up/wrong/  
15:18 <andrewmcveigh|wo> Well, E.G., when using non-latin characters, they don't save to mysql correctly. The get saved as "?"  
15:18 <tmortagne> andrewmcveigh|wo: and jut changing this configuration fixed it ?  
15:19 <andrewmcveigh|wo> Yep. Deleting the extra amp; worked.  
15:19 <tmortagne> ok  
15:20 <andrewmcveigh|wo> I have the same issue on 2 separate Ubuntu 12.04 LTS boxes. They're both fresh installs.  
15:21 <tmortagne> ok,  I see where to fix it  
15:21 <tmortagne> would be great if you could create a jira issue  
15:21 <andrewmcveigh|wo> Yep, in the process...  
15:24 <polx> has quit  
15:27 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <andrewmcveigh|wo> OK, I added it to jira http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1332 . Cheers for looking at it.  
15:37 <Slashman> has quit  
15:38 <tmortagne> andrewmcveigh|wo: thanks  
15:41 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <andrewmcveigh|wo> No probs, thanks for looking at it so quick :)
